replies.body: They used to work in walls, I assume the work in Nebula maps. A while back they stopped working in walls maps, although I believe that was fixed as Seth told me that he could test Grotto Arena (A walls map that uses villagers). So I assumed they either think they have fixed it, or they are trying to. It could add a ton of really cool maps if they get it fixed, if it's not already. :)

I made this map but the villagers don't spawn in. I'm still trying to find the issue. It works on some maps but on others, it doesn't.

It's a regional error (all I heard)
You can always try but there isn't a guarantee that'll work.

replies.body: Last time I tried Groto, the villagers spawned in perfectly. The only reason that it the map was never used was because of Cookiemonster. One of the villagers sold 16 cookies for 1 emerald so it was too op until my recent removal of that kit so the map is better.
